summary.para: With message security and mixed-mode security, this defines when a timestamp element should be generated and demanded in the WS-Security header.
Always generate a timestamp in each outgoing message and demand a timestamp be present in each incoming message, whether those messages are requests or replies.
Do not use timestamps in requests or replies. It is an error to specify this value when a mixed-mode message signature is required in the WS-Security header.
Generate and demand timestamps in client to server request messages, but not in server to client reply messages. This value may be used in mixed-mode security.
